REUTERS.UNKNOWN: L f0992 reute u f BC-INDIANAPOLIS-HOGS-UP 04-07 0055

TEXT.TITLE: INDIANAPOLIS HOGS UP 1.25/1.50 DLR - USDA
TEXT.BODY: barrow and gilt prices rose 1.25 to 1.50 dlr in active trade, the usda said. top 52.25 dlrs per cwt. us 1-3 225-255 lbs 51.50-52.00, 40 head 52.25. sows - steady in moderately active trade. us 1-3 400-525 lbs 42.00-43.00 and package 650 lbs 49.00. Reuter
